answers.text:
The following areas are ones that the Knowledge Network has information on. 
Expenditure Policy:
This document shows police and fire expenditures in 2012 (icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/304841)
Also Check out the Center for Priority Based Budgeting as they give advice in this areas (http://icma.org/en/results/management_strategies/leading_practices/priority-based_budgeting)
Allocation of Overhead Cost: 
Again the Center for Priority Based Budgeting has a few documents and case studies on the Knowledge Network related to this (icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303356), (icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/305406), and (icma.org/Documents/QuestionAnswer/Document/10749).
Disaster Preparedness:
Check out the Emergency Preparedness Topic (http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/81/Emergency_Preparedness)
Here is an excerpt from an ICMA book on disaster preparedness (http://bookstore.icma.org/freedocs/DisasterPreparedness-Excerpt.pdf)
Here is a past question on unspent preparedness funds(http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/22095)
Multi-Year Financial Plan:
Here is a power point on leading practices for long term financial planning (icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/305234)
Capital Maintenance, Renewal, and Replacement:
Here is a past question on past capital renewal and improvement projects( http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/22399)
Here is an article on asset and infrastructure management(http://icma.org/en/Article/10888/The_Scorecard_Approach_for_Infrastructure_Asset_Management)
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

Revenue Estimating Conference
Expenditure Policy 
Allocation of Overhead Cost 
Disaster Preparedness
Multi-Year Financial Plan
Capital Maintenance, Renewal, and Replacement
I will be adding an answer but if you have any additional documents please add them! The more resources the better. 
Thank you,

ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
